info.title: Partners API
info.description: Mock Patients API for testing and development. Provides comprehensive patient management endpoints with authentication and validation.

get.description: Get API information and available endpoints
List all patients with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query to filter patients by email, firstName, lastName, or phone

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

total.description: Total number of patients matching the query

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error or invalid data

get.description: Get a specific patient by ID

404.description: Not Found - Patient does not exist
Not Found - Patient does not exist

post.description: Seed random patients for testing and development

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of patients to create (1-500, default: 10)

get.description: Get protocols associated with a specific program

200.description: List of protocols for the program

get.description: Get a specific protocol by ID

post.description: Reactivate an existing enrollment for a patient

get.description: Get all protocol enrollments for a specific patient

200.description: List of protocol enrollments for the patient

post.description: Enroll a patient in a protocol

program_enrollments_count.description: Number of individual program enrollments created

409.description: Patient already enrolled in this protocol

post.description: Reset the database to initial state
Seed the database with sample data

sample.description: Whether to create sample data with protocols (default: true)

birth_date.description: Patient's birth date in YYYY-MM-DD format
Patient's birth date in YYYY-MM-DD format

default.description: Whether this is the default address

abbreviated_name.description: Program abbreviated name (required for active enrollments)

latest_payment_date.description: Latest payment date in YYYY-MM-dd format

start_date.description: Enrollment start date in yyyy-MM-dd format (required for active enrollments)

end_date.description: Enrollment end date in yyyy-MM-dd format

field.description: Field that caused the validation error

program_ids.description: Array of program IDs associated with this protocol

is_standard.description: Whether this is a standard protocol (1:1 with program) or custom (N:1)

program_ids.description: Array of program IDs associated with this protocol

is_standard.description: Whether this is a standard protocol (1:1 with program) or custom (N:1)

program_enrollments.description: Array of individual program enrollments created by this protocol enrollment

NotFoundError.description: Not Found - Resource does not exist
